articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has introduced a fund of $100 million to bolster startups focusing on generative AI.
articles.title: Amazon Pledges $100 Million for Generative AI Startups

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The software giant is using a "play money" version of the stablecoin to help clients test out sending money overseas.
articles.title: SAP Clients Testing Circle’s USDC to Fix Cross-Border Payment ‘Hassle’

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The theft of the ChatGPT login credentials was orchestrated using the Raccoon Infostealer malware, said cybersecurity firm Group-IB.
articles.title: Hackers Leak Over 100,000 ChatGPT Credentials on the Dark Web

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: The Spanish soccer icon's latest NFT play is artwork inspired by women's club captain Alexia Putellas, with real-world perks for the buyer.
articles.title: FC Barcelona, World of Women Reveal 'Empowerment' Soccer NFT Auction

articles.description: Marc Mercuri, Head of Platform for Web3 shooter Shrapnel, speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo about GameBridge, a feature that simplifies blockchain item composability and interoperability.
articles.title: What Is GameBridge? Inside Shrapnel's Gaming Innovation

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Zebedee’s app now supports popular mobile games—including Dragon City and Slotomania—that pay Bitcoin for each minute you play.
articles.title: You Can Earn Bitcoin for Playing Over 100 Android Games

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Once Hut 8 and U.S. Bitcoin Corp. complete their merger, the resulting U.S.-based company will be one of the largest public miners in North America.
articles.title: A New Bitcoin Mining Giant Prepares to Enter the Fray

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: As the submarine drama unfolds, crypto gamblers on Polymarket are betting on whether the manned vessel will be found by the end of Friday.
articles.title: Degens Have Bet $170K in Crypto on Missing Titanic Submarine Being Found

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan,Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Crypto custodian BitGo announced it was ending talks to acquire rival Prime Trust, ending the acquistion two weeks after it was announced.
articles.title: BitGo Cancels Prime Trust Acquisition, Users Report Frozen Withdrawals

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The co-founders of the bankrupt crypto hedge fund Three Arrows Capital (3AC) are launching a new investment venture.
articles.title: Three Arrows Co-Founders Are Back With a New VC Fund. Is Anyone Buying?

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: StarkWare’s novel scaling functionality, Volition, promises to make it possible to reduce Ethereum gas fees by up to 90%.
articles.title: Ethereum Micropayments Solution Volition Aims to Make 'Crypto for Coffee Transactions Viable'

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The facilities are expected to add nearly 1 exahash per second to CleanSpark's bitcoin mining capacity.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miner CleanSpark Claims Two Georgia Facilities For $9.3 Million

articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: Animoca Brands’ inventive play-and-earn riff on chess is supported by Chess.com and due to roll out in 2024.
articles.title: Anichess Raises $1.5 Million to Put Magical Twist on Chess

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The Atomic Wallet team reported that they are working to recover the funds, but would not confirm how much money was stolen in the attack.
articles.title: Atomic Wallet Claims 'Less Than 0.1%' of Users Affected by $100M Hack

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: How will the revelations in the Hinman emails play out for Ripple and Coinbase in their SEC court battles? Legal experts weigh in.
articles.title: Ripple Has Played Its Hinman Hand—Could It Help Coinbase?

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The meme coin sector posted impressive gains as market sentiment turned positive with Bitcoin’s breakout above $30,000.
articles.title: PEPE's 79% Weekly Gains Lead Meme Coin Surge as DOGE, SHIB, FLOKI Up Double Digits

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse said the approval reaffirmed the company’s commitment to the Asia-Pacific region.
articles.title: Ripple Gains In-Principle Payments License in Singapore

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The long-running NFT card game is now available in Epic’s popular marketplace, as part of a year of expansion for Gods Unchained.
articles.title: Gods Unchained Hits Epic Games Store Ahead of Mobile Expansion

articles.description: Daniel Paez, Executive Producer on Immutable X-based card-battler Gods Unchained, discusses the long-running NFT game's launch on the Epic Games Store and the opportunity it provides.
articles.title: Gods Unchained Executive Producer Discusses Epic Games Store Move

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Bathhouse shared how the process works, inviting people to “enjoy a hot pool while supporting the Bitcoin network.”
articles.title: New York City Spa Gets Heat for Heating with Bitcoin Mining

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Crypto’s growth is just a natural part of an increasingly digitized world, says Bob Diamond.
articles.title: Ex- Barclays CEO Praises BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Filing

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: A clever name for a proposed Bitcoin fund affirms recent trends in institutional adoption.
articles.title: Bitcoin ETF Printer Goes ‘BRRR’ as Valkyrie Refiles With SEC

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: “We do see payments stablecoins as a form of money," Powell said, adding that "the ultimate source of credibility in money is the central bank."
articles.title: Fed Chair Powell Says Bitcoin Has 'Staying Power' as an Asset Class

articles.author: Euny Hong
articles.description: The 9dcc x Stapleverse baseball cap is sold via a redeemable NFT and can be digitally signed. The co-creators spoke to Decrypt in Paris.
articles.title: Jeff Staple, Gmoney Drop 'Pigeon Shit' Cap Collab at Paris Fashion Week

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: A new bipartisan bid emerges to set a regulatory framework amid a global race to control how AI takes part in the society of the future.
articles.title: US Congress Presses Forward on AI Regulation With Proposed Commission

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Another day, another country signaling it has questions for its local Binance subsidiary.
articles.title: Binance Exec May Be Called to Testify in Brazil Over Alleged Pyramid Schemes

articles.author: Lucy Harley-McKeown
articles.description: Co-founder Jacob Horne said Ethereum gas fees are a "systemic inhibitor" to Web3 adoption. The Zora Network aims to help.
articles.title: Zora Launches Layer-2 NFT Network to Battle Ethereum Gas Fees

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Ethereum scaling solution developer integrates OpenAI's ChatGPT to launch Polygon Copilot.
articles.title: Polygon Launches Its Own Copilot, a ChatGPT AI Assistant Chatbot

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: It began when Feng Xiao, then-CEO of Wanxiang Blockchain Labs, befriended Buterin and purchased $500,000 worth of Ethereum in 2015.
articles.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Has Ties to SEC Darling Prometheum—Here's How

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Big investors are feeling bullish about the biggest cryptocurrency—and the rest of the crypto market.
articles.title: Bitcoin Shoots Past $30,000 as Wall Street Eyes Up 'Digital Gold'

articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: Artificial intelligence can play a part in creating eligible music, but ultimately only a human can accept a Grammy award.
articles.title: The Grammys Will Allow Songs Created With AI Help

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Neutron, a CosmWasm smart contract platform for the Cosmos "internet of blockchains," has raised $10 million in a funding round.
articles.title: Neutron Raises $10 Million to Develop Smart Contracts on Cosmos

articles.author: Alyssa Hertig
articles.description: The Bitcoin-centric startup has embraced Ethereum, offering ETH holders self-custody vaults that require multiple signatures to transact.
articles.title: Bitcoin Startup Casa Expands Beyond BTC With Ethereum Vaults

articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: "It's utterly horrifying," said one artist of the realization that Marvel's latest comic book adaptation tapped AI tools.
articles.title: Marvel's 'Secret Invasion' Show Uses Generative AI—And Fans and Creators Are Livid

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Bitcoin has brought the rest of the market with it as it closes in on $30,000, as altcoins follow in its wake.
articles.title: Bitcoin Cash, Stacks, and Pepe Lead Alts Parade as Bitcoin Breaks Above $29,000

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The largest cryptocurrency has reclaimed $29,000 amid a wave of ETF filings in the U.S. and rising interest from institutional investors.
articles.title: Bitcoin Hits $29,000 Following BlackRock, WisdomTree, Invesco ETF Filings

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Publicly funded investment bank Bpifrance looms large in the French crypto scene. The firm’s crypto lead shared insights on its Web3 fund with Decrypt.
articles.title: Ledger Investor Bpifrance Exploring ZK Proofs, AI

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: The Grand Slam tennis championship will use IBM’s artificial intelligence tech to produce audio commentary for highlights packages.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2023 to Feature AI-Generated Highlights Commentary

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The Darknet Marketplace and Digital Currency Crimes Task Force formalizes a prior collaboration between five law enforcement agencies.
articles.title: Federal Agencies Form New U.S. Crypto Crime Task Force

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The SEC is facing a fresh wave of spot Bitcoin ETF applications from major investment firms, in the wake of BlackRock's filing.
articles.title: WisdomTree, Invesco Follow BlackRock With Spot Bitcoin ETF Applications

articles.description: Words With Friends and Wildcard Creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on Axie Infinity and Web3 games.
articles.title: 'Play-to-Earn Is Not Dead. It Will Never Die' Says Words with Friends Creator Paul Bettner

articles.description: Cross the Ages is a digital collectible card game that challenges players to duel online opponents—and you can even mint your cards as tradable NFTs. It's complex and difficult to grasp at first, but this mobile-first game has some serious strategic upside. GG contributor Ryan Gladwin puts Cross the Ages through its paces.
articles.title: Cross the Ages Game Review: A Tough But Rewarding Card Battler

articles.description: In this interview, Decrypt's Jason Nelson chats with Alchemy product manager and AlchemyAI project lead Elan Halpern on blockchain analysis using ChatGPT, what AI means for better user experience, and the need to fact-check AI. Halpern also gives a demo of the new AlchemyAI ChatGPT plugin.
articles.title: "AI Is Game-Changing But Needs Fact-Checking": AlchemyAI Project Lead

articles.description: Justin Kan was a co-founder of Twitch and now works on Fractal, a Web3 gaming startup. Kan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his new company and what he's up to.
articles.title: Fractal Is Like an Arcade, Says Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin discusses the current regulatory climate in the U.S. with Gala Games' President of Blockchain Jason Brink.
articles.title: Are NFTs the Next SEC Target?

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CCO and co-founder of Collab.Land Anjali Young explained at this year’s NFC Lisbon the origins of the crypto community tool kit, which industry niches are turning to its suite of products, and what’s next for the project since its token distribution event last February.
articles.title: Collab.Land Co-Founder Said There Was No ‘Aha Moment’ When Launching DAO Toolkit

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: With H.R. Giger's original "Alien" statue on full display at this year's NFC Lisbon, Particle CEO Harold Eytan told Decrypt that owning an NFT-ified slice of the piece isn't just for fans of the iconic creature and movie series but also for fine art collectors. Interested in owning a piece? Be prepared to cough up half an ETH for one of the 500 tranches of the digitized sculpture.
articles.title: Buying a Slice of H.R. Giger's 'Alien' Is Fine Art, Not Memorabilia: Particle CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The founder and CEO of metaverse fashion platform BNV Richard Hobbs said big brands are still nervous to let fans and community members customize their favorite garments. Still, he believes that as long as you can meet a firm's commercial bottom lines while stirring engagement, there's nothing to lose.
articles.title: Community Co-Creation 'Is a Big Step for Fashion Brands' Entering the Metaverse: BNV Founder and CEO

articles.description: Alok Vasudev is a co-founder of venture capital firm Standard Crypto. In an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, he shares his thoughts on NFT marketing, NFT utility in gaming, and the stigma that pervades the industry.
articles.title: Standard Crypto VC Co-Founder on NFTs and Their Stigma in Gaming

articles.description: Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang shares news with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the crypto firm's latest push to help traditional game developers break into blockchain gaming.
articles.title: Ava Labs Announces Avalanche Arcad3 for Game Developers at 3XP

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: At this year’s NFC Lisbon, multimedia artist and photographer YuLiang "YuYu" Liu broke down how themes from traditional painting and BDSM informed his latest NFT exhibition called “GAG.” He also shared exclusively with Decrypt a yet-to-be-launched drop for fans of his work.
articles.title: ‘Like a Middle Finger to Western Culture’: YuYu Unpacks Inspiration Behind NFT Expo GAG

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Zerion's move to launch a mobile-first crypto wallet not only helped NFT users swap jpegs on the go but was also a play to get away from crypto's desktop-centric user experience. And with such little competition, Zerion's head of growth Alexander Guy told Decrypt at NFC Lisbon it's managed to rake in 150,000 funded wallets. Next step? Taking on MetaMask and contending as a browser-extension wallet.
articles.title: 'Competition Was Rather Low' in Mobile Wallet Space, Says Zerion Head of Growth

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The Sandbox COO Sebastien Borget told Decrypt at this year’s NFC Lisbon that despite the high price point, Apple’s new VR headset is nonetheless “groundbreaking.” And though the tech giant never used the term “metaverse” in its reveal, Borget is sure that the technology will be key in growing participation in various digital worlds.
articles.title: ‘We’ve Never Seen Anything Like This in VR’, Says The Sandbox COO on Apple’s Vision Pro Headset

articles.description: Gala Games President of Blockchain shares his thoughts on the GALA token upgrade and the latest SEC turmoil with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Is Gala Safe? Gala Games Head of Blockchain on GALA, Crypto, and SEC Regulatory Turmoil

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Getting non-crypto artists to make the leap into Web3 comes in ebbs and flows according to the market’s bear and bull waves, says co-founder of NFT Club Berlin and Superteam Germany Rebekka Revel. But she’s hoping to change that by changing the narrative around digital collectibles, regardless of the market, one word at a time.
articles.title: Artists Adopting NFTs Has Been ‘Really Market Dependent’, Says NFT Club Berlin’s Rebekka Revel

articles.description: Co-founder and co-CEO of Web3 media brand Superduper Dom Smith says big brands are eager to enter the space—they just don’t know how. Still, they all maintain a thesis of turning their communities into “super fans” that generate value for users as well as a firm’s bottom line.
articles.title: Big Brands Exploring Web3 to ‘Scale Up Their Super-fan Base’: Superduper Co-founder

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: As his food mask creations went viral on the Internet during the COVID lockdowns, reposted on TikTok and Instagram without his consent, he soon asked: "How do I protect my digital files?" Performance artist Foodmasku describes at this year's NFC Lisbon how that simple question spiraled into a minting collection after collection of his edible works.
articles.title: How 1 Simple Question Kickstarted Performance Artist Foodmasku's Plunge Into NFTs

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CEO and co-founder of Arianee Pierre Nicolas Hurstel unpacks the wide spectrum of digital collectibles from 10,000 PFP collections to access passes for exclusive events. And with an unannounced big brand soon joining, Hurstel revealed at NFC Lisbon which kind of NFTs big brands are moving towards.
articles.title: Arianee CEO Pegs Wine and Spirits as Next 'Exciting' Industry to Make Web3 Leap
